name: AShaseana
text: Food is always fresh and hot

name: Rachel Eva
text: Said it was on the way for over 40 minutes (I live 5 minutes away) when it finally came, it was completely cold and smelled/tasted like ham. (I didn‚Äôt order ham FYI)

name: Jeremy Johnson
text: This place constantly delivers. They have fantastic dishes for reasonable prices, there are no long waits even when the spot is busy.

name: Barry Hoover
text: I think these folks do a great job all things considered with COVID and it not being an easy job. My food is always prepared properly and tastes great. Tip when you carry out!

name: Daniel Ealy
text: Served my crew Action Landscaping LLC for lunch , very good pizza  !!

name: Willie McFarland
text: We enjoy eating out. Last night we  visited this excellent restaurant which we didn‚Äôt know before. We enjoyed a lovely experience there with high-qulity meal and a nice crew and  a professional chief cook. We  added this fine restaurant in our phone list  and we shall definitely go again soon.  Highly recommended.

name: Nick Chase
text: Almost all of the toppings were on one side of the pizza. Pizza is also slightly undercooked.

name: James Mays
text: Employees did not wear facemask or gloves per Michigan Excutive Order. One gentleman observed making applying pizza toppings with no gloves and another gentleman cutting and boxing pizzas with mask on but under his chin. Pizza was luke warm and undercooked

name: Johnny B
text: They have a sign stating that they will give you free bread sticks for a 5 star review. ‚Ä¶More

name: Bonnie Lerner
text: I ordered a pizza and wings from Hungry Howies for the first time.  I read reviews before I got my order but I always like to form my own opinion.  So I told the guy on the phone the delivery guy needs to wear a mask to come in our ‚Ä¶More

name: Jeff Swiger
text: Great customer service always have loved Hungry Howie's Pizza. Today the guy that took my order for a heart-shaped pizza for my girlfriend was nice enough to deliver a little extra distance. Great customer service will definitely recommend.

name: Quincy Farrell
text: The menu and service were beyond our expectations. We absolutely liked the environment of this spot. Extraordinary place to take my family out for lunch.

name: phil dawg
text: It's always clean there , and has a great staff.

name: Scott Spellman
text: The food was good. However, I only found out after I placed the order that they would not deliver to my apartment door, they would only come as far as the front door outside and downstairs.  I had to pay the delivery fee and go downstairs to get my food. Every other pizza company comes to my door.  Never again.

name: mike pirtle
text: Friendly staff made a great pizza

name: Donna England
text: Great pizza and the best service. Thank you

name: Jon P
text: The staff do not wash their hands and can't handle the pressure when busy. Also noticed one guy smoking his vape pen and cleaning out his ear on the prep table making pizzas. Will not be going there again and don't recommend anyone to as well. Try the one on John R just south of 13 mile, very clean and respectful

name: Brad Fisk
text: Always hot and ready in a timely manner.

name: J H
text: I wish I would have checked the reviews before ordering from this location. I placed an online order and continued to check the status of the pizza on their ‚Äútrack your pizza‚Äù feature. ‚Ä¶More

name: Patrick Nagle
text: I sat waiting for my pizza I saw in the warmer for fifteen minutes, there were five employees there, but none of them cared to just ring me up and get me on my way.  Flipping annoying. ‚Ä¶More

name: Autumn Fields
text: Awesome üçï and the new stuffed bread is amazing.

name: Andrew Siegle
text: They now have cheese filled Howie bread!

name: Art Hennessey
text: Awesome!!!  I ordered an extra large, double cheese, pepperoni, sausage and bacon with butter/herb crust and this pizza kicked serious backside.  I called the manager Eric and shared with him just how awesome it was.  I will order from this location again, if you are in the area give this place a shot, you won't be sorry.

name: Zoran
text: Unpretentious but surprisingly good pizza with very tasty crust. Very friendly staff, consistent and in my experience always punctual service. Beats many of the surrounding pizza establishments. If not sure go for half and half with various toppings until you find your favorite.

name: Mary Jorah
text: Its actually hard for me to rate the pizza since we could not order. 3 of us tried to order the .45 & 1.00 on-line special last Thursday evening 9-13-18. We were meeting at a nearby business & tried to order. Since it wouldn't go through we ‚Ä¶More

name: Brenda Lusk
text: Good food and my order was perfect.

name: Jeff Wright
text: Last night after driving home for 3 hours my family and guest were hungry.  I said we'll order a pizza from Hungry Howie on a 11 mile in Royal Oak.  It's one of my favorite places to order out.  I ordered a large The Works - one large Pepsi ‚Ä¶More

name: Angela Tinkham
text: Love ordering from Here. Good prices and awesome pizza. Their salads and garlic bread are really good too. Pizzas always hot.Love it!

name: Courtney Herbert
text: Literally worst hungry howies ever. I have ordered from here 3 times and they have consistently forgotten my sauce for the pizza and cheese bread. I‚Äôm not sure what circus trick I need to pull for them to give me a ranch or marinara sauce. ‚Ä¶More

name: Adam Jurski
text: Good pizza, delivery has been within a reasonable time. I have personally never had a problem with the staff, but have seen issues with other customers when I have picked up pizzas before, as other reviews have mentioned. Felt like they could have been handled a bit better, but for me personally it has been fine.

name: Malinda Morrison
text: Horrible service! I literally live a mile from the store and SEVERAL times I've ordered delivery, our food arrived COLD (not even warm) and an hour or more late. In the past, I've called the store to complain and was told, "our driver is ‚Ä¶More

name: Shortlady16
text: Prefer hungry Howie's to most other pizza shops because of the flavored crust options. I do find that there is some inconsistency with a quantity of toppings even though I typically order the same combination regularly.

name: Detroit Devin
text: The only thing I dont like is sometimes on the phone they dont honor discounts I see online when I order online. New ownership is way better food is much better now.

name: Toni Trager-Bradley
text: Love my thin crust well done w pepperoni

name: Marc Williams
text:
I only rated this place a one because there wasn't a lower rating.  Hungry Howies has great Pizza and I am a fan.  This particular location is awful.
I have had four separate problems either with the quality of the food and or the ‚Ä¶More
Hey good pizza and comes hot to the door , what else do you want ..

name: Keith Belknap
text: Love the food, especially my favorite go-to-order that includes a Cajun crusted Hawaiian pizza with Howie Bread and Garlic Butter sauce.  I've always been pleased with the food I get except for one occasion about a month ago. ‚Ä¶More

name: Mike Wilson
text: Mitchell, the shift manager, almost took my order.  I say almost because he dissuaded me from ordering by purposefully talking over me at every opportunity.  He did, though, persuade me that Cottage Inn and 2 Guys from Italy are better choices, have better prices and will take your order in a professional manner.

name: Claire Trzasko
text: Changing my review, the last few visits after I‚Äôve given them another chance have been nothing short of phenomenal and I‚Äôll continue to patron and highly recommend!

name: Brad Ather
text: Good pizza at a good price

name: Amy Haas
text: I placed an order online for the first time and totally screwed it up. I ordered the wrong specialty pizza and the one that I ordered nobody would end up eating so I called up to the store location and they replaced it with the correct ‚Ä¶More

name: Ashley Stone
text: Awful costumer service. I placed a delivery order and after an hour and a half we called to check on it and they said it was on the way. I waited 15 more minutes, called again, and they said it would be another 20-30 minutes but it was on ‚Ä¶More

name: T Berg
text: Had a good experience pizza was hot, fresh and tasted great

name: Tecora Hicks
text: Excellent service and I will have to go again.

name: Chuck Siedlecki
text: Called after an hour they said Delivery still on its way., Waited another hour and wound up ordering Dominos which showed up in 25 minutes....

name: Karen N
text: Totally incompetent. I received four charges in my debit card for a pizza delivery. Not one person in hat store including the general manager can accept any responsibility and help. Now I have a car payment that is going to bounce because ‚Ä¶More

name: george michael
text: Pretty good overall. Way too greasy, but definitely better than frozen pizza

name: Steve Dalton
text: These guys don't care. Got cold pizza an hour later when I live a mile from the place. No interest in providing custom service in any way other than bad. I will not go there again and I suggest you do the same.

name: Kristofer Golbiw
text: Shop makes some good pie, love the original flavoured crust, yummy

name: Sherry Sharbaugh
text: En route to pick up the gift for our hockey coach, I had to make a stop at Hungry Howie's on 11 Mile in Royal Oak, MI. Why? Because their female driver ran the red light at Campbell and Lincoln. I was stopped at the red light on Lincoln, ‚Ä¶More

name: Grant Inskeep
text: Not the greatest pizza but it's pizza and was pretty fairly priced. Would much rather had dominoes or papa John's

name: Austin Shyu
text: My experiences with this location have been subpar to bad. They have on separate occasions burned the pizza, skimped on sauce, or not made my order altogether.

name: Shawn Silver
text: I've been going here for years. I don't think I've ever had a bad pizza. Everyone is nice - I'm not sure what this other guy is talking about.

name: EricaThePoetess
text: I understand from the people I speak with in the surrounding area, that I was lucky to get hot fresh pizza and sort-of friendly service. I have not been back so I can remember them as good to me when I was hungry.

name: Michael Prevo
text: Bummer.  The kids were looking forward to their favorite pizza but our special order doesn't work with their online ordering system and they seem to have finally given up answering the phone at this location.

name: Jeremy Work
text: Fast. Good taste. I have been here a few times now, with no complaints. I will be back.

name: Jason Rowe
text: Fast, friendly service. Plus they have the best flavored crust in town.

name: Tyler Creed
text: They would not deliver past john r Rd, guess they think they're to good for Madison heights even tho I'm 1 street past john r, pathetic lazy people can't perform a job. Propbly why they still work at hungry howies

name: Stacey Dalton
text: Thought we'd give another try.... Horrible experience 4 years ago..... Still horrible today. Late delivery, cold pizza, bad customer service, no one answered phone..... Not sure how they are in business....

name: Teresa R
text: Always hot, fresh pizza and calzones.

name: Adam Eizen
text: Great pizza with flavored crust.

name: Erik Jensen

name: Erin Harman
text: Really wished I could give the establishment a lower rating! Brian the child or should i say man child was rude, unprofessional, and really just appalling. Hey Brian you work in costumer service act like it!! No worries your boss will help me üòÇüòÇüòÇ

name: Kelsy Murphy
text: I‚Äôve been here twice and both times it says the order is complete and it isn‚Äôt! It take well over an hour to get pizza from here

name: Leah Osterman
text: Tastey pizza both regular and gluten free !

name: Tonya Cole
text: I placed an order online and when I came in to pay he told me he had given me a coupon so my pizza was only $5! Thank you the pizza was amazing and so was the service!

name: Guy Krowl
text: Mike Wilson. You suck. Buy your own shop duche

name: Abernathy Tabernacle
text: I don't know why everyone's saying all the bad juju but I've been going here literally for years and have never had a problem. Pizza quality is roughly analogous to every other hungry Howies. Service is fine, its not the Ritz its a pizza joint staffed by young people. Maybe ppl go here expecting pizza mecca? Not sure.

name: Veronica Cobb
text: Fresh! Hot! Clean! Fast & Friendly Service!

text: Guy hung up on me I definitely  will never buy from this brand again.  So many companies to cocky

text: Website claims they are open till 11 pm, not the case. Placed order at 10 pm and they cancelled my order.
